main.bio: FullStack Developer with total 3.2 years of experience and 3 years in ASP .NET Core, C#, SSMS, Microsoft SQL Server, JavaScript, HTML, CSS also 1 year of experience in Angular. Successfully developed and deployed code to Azure Cloud. Strong problem-solving abilities, and a team-oriented approach to building scalable applications.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my skill sets

experience.title: ASP .NET Developer Application Support
experience.responsibilities:
Technologies Used - ASP .NET Core, C#, HTML , CSS , JAVASCRIPT , Azure Cloud, SQL Server Management Studio.
Worked on Enhancements, Bug Fixes and Service Improvement Changes in application.
Conducted unit testing, debugging to identify and resolve issues.
Managed source code using Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines to automate the build and deployment process.
experience.achievements:
Successful deployments of bug fixes, enhancements, new features.
Reduced production issues through unit testing. 
Provided timely technical support, reducing downtime andLearned to collaborate with the team, completing crucial tasks and maintaining deadlines.

experience.company: Rexx Media Pvt Ltd, Jan 2021 - June 2021 (Internship)
experience.title: Mobile Application Developer Intern
experience.responsibilities:
Technologies Used - Flutter , Dart. 
Developed and maintained mobile applications using Flutter and Dart, enhancing user experience with responsive and visually appealing interfaces.
Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement new features, including user authentication, push notifications, and data synchronization. 
Conducted unit tests and participated in code reviews to ensure high-quality code and application performance.
experience.achievements: Learned and gained knowledge of Flutter framework and Dart Language.
